activeDotProps.description: Props passed down to all active dots. Ignored if withDots={false} is set.
activeDotProps.description_zh: Props 向下传递到所有活动点。如果设置了 withDots={false}，则忽略。

areaChartProps.description: Props passed down to recharts AreaChart component
areaChartProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts AreaChart 组件的 props

areaProps.description: Props passed down to recharts Area component
areaProps.description_zh: 传递给 recharts Area 组件的 props

children.description: Additional components that are rendered inside recharts AreaChart component
children.description_zh: 在 recharts AreaChart 组件中呈现的其他组件

connectNulls.description: Determines whether points with null values should be connected, true by default
connectNulls.description_zh: 确定是否应连接具有 null 值的点，默认情况下为 true

curveType.description: Type of the curve, 'monotone' by default

dataKey *.description: Key of the data object for x-axis values
dataKey *.description_zh: x 轴值的数据对象的键

dotProps.description: Props passed down to all dots. Ignored if withDots={false} is set.
dotProps.description_zh: Props 向下传递到所有点。如果设置了 withDots={false}，则忽略。

fillOpacity.description: Controls fill opacity of all areas, 0.2 by default
fillOpacity.description_zh: 控制所有区域的填充不透明度，默认为 0.2

gridAxis.description: Specifies which lines should be displayed in the grid, 'x' by default
gridAxis.description_zh: 指定网格中应显示哪些线条，默认为 'x'

gridColor.description: Color of the grid and cursor lines, by default depends on color scheme
gridColor.description_zh: 网格和光标线的颜色，默认情况下取决于配色方案

gridProps.description: Props passed down to the CartesianGrid component
gridProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 CartesianGrid 组件的 props

legendProps.description: Props passed down to the Legend component
legendProps.description_zh: 传递给 Legend 组件的 props

referenceLines.description: Reference lines that should be displayed on the chart
referenceLines.description_zh: 图表上应显示的参考线

rightYAxisLabel.description: A label to display next to the right y-axis
rightYAxisLabel.description_zh: 要在右侧 y 轴旁边显示的标签

rightYAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the YAxis recharts component rendered on the right side
rightYAxisProps.description_zh: 向下传递到右侧渲染的 YAxis recharts 组件的 props

series *.description: An array of objects with name and color keys. Determines which data should be consumed from the data array.
series *.description_zh: 具有 name 和 color 键的对象数组。确定应使用数据数组中的哪些数据。

splitColors.description: A tuple of colors used when type="split" is set, ignored in all other cases. A tuple may include theme colors reference or any valid CSS colors ['green.7', 'red.7'] by default.
splitColors.description_zh: 设置 type=“split” 时使用的颜色元组，在所有其他情况下都将被忽略。默认情况下，元组可以包含主题颜色引用或任何有效的 CSS 颜色 ['green.7'， 'red.7']。

splitOffset.description: Offset for the split gradient. By default, value is inferred from data and series if possible. Must be generated from the data array with getSplitOffset function.
splitOffset.description_zh: 拆分渐变的偏移量。默认情况下，如果可能，将从 data 和 series 推断 value。必须使用 getSplitOffset 函数从数据数组生成。

strokeDasharray.description: Dash array for the grid lines and cursor, '5 5' by default
strokeDasharray.description_zh: 网格线和光标的虚线数组，默认为 '5 5'

strokeWidth.description: Stroke width for the chart areas, 2 by default
strokeWidth.description_zh: 图表区的描边宽度，默认为 2

textColor.description: Color of the text displayed inside the chart, 'dimmed' by default
textColor.description_zh: 图表内显示的文本颜色，默认为 'dimmed'

tickLine.description: Specifies which axis should have tick line, 'y' by default
tickLine.description_zh: 指定哪个轴应具有刻度线，默认为 'y'

tooltipAnimationDuration.description: Tooltip position animation duration in ms, 0 by default
tooltipAnimationDuration.description_zh: 工具提示位置动画持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 0

tooltipProps.description: Props passed down to the Tooltip component
tooltipProps.description_zh: 向下传递到 Tooltip 组件的 props

type.description: Controls how chart areas are positioned relative to each other, 'default' by default
type.description_zh: 控制图表区之间的相对位置，默认为 'default'

unit.description: Unit displayed next to each tick in y-axis
unit.description_zh: 在 y 轴上每个刻度旁边显示的单位

valueFormatter.description: A function to format values on Y axis and inside the tooltip
valueFormatter.description_zh: 用于在 Y 轴上和工具提示内设置值格式的函数

withDots.description: Determines whether dots should be displayed, true by default
withDots.description_zh: 确定是否应显示点，默认为 true

withGradient.description: Determines whether the chart area should be represented with a gradient instead of the solid color, false by default
withGradient.description_zh: 确定是否应使用渐变而不是纯色（默认情况下为 false）表示图表区

withLegend.description: Determines whether chart legend should be displayed, false by default
withLegend.description_zh: 确定是否应显示图表图例，默认为 false

withPointLabels.description: Determines whether each point should have associated label, false by default
withPointLabels.description_zh: 确定每个点是否应具有关联的标签，默认情况下为 false

withRightYAxis.description: Determines whether additional y-axis should be displayed on the right side of the chart, false by default
withRightYAxis.description_zh: 确定是否应在图表右侧显示其他 y 轴，默认情况下为 false

withTooltip.description: Determines whether chart tooltip should be displayed, true by default
withTooltip.description_zh: 确定是否应显示图表工具提示，默认为 true

withXAxis.description: Determines whether x-axis should be displayed, true by default
withXAxis.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 x 轴，默认为 true

withYAxis.description: Determines whether y-axis should be displayed, true by default
withYAxis.description_zh: 确定是否应显示 y 轴，默认为 true

xAxisLabel.description: A label to display below the x-axis
xAxisLabel.description_zh: 要在 x 轴下方显示的标签

xAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the XAxis recharts component
xAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 XAxis recharts 组件的 props

yAxisLabel.description: A label to display next to the y-axis
yAxisLabel.description_zh: 要在 y 轴旁边显示的标签

yAxisProps.description: Props passed down to the YAxis recharts component
yAxisProps.description_zh: 传递给 YAxis recharts 组件的 props
